Who was convicted of murdering Nipsey Hussle?
Eric Holder Jr.
When was Eric Holder Jr. found guilty of first-degree murder?
July 2022
Where did the shooting of Nipsey Hussle take place?
Outside The Marathon Clothing store in South Los Angeles
What was the sentence given to Eric Holder Jr. on Wednesday?
60 years to life in prison
What additional charges was Eric Holder Jr. convicted of?
Two counts of attempted voluntary manslaughter and two counts of assault with a firearm
What was Holder's attorney's argument for reducing the conviction?
To reduce it to voluntary manslaughter
What was the prosecution's argument for the murder being premeditated?
It was a result of long-building tensions
What gang did both Holder and Hussle belong to?
Rollin' 60s gang
What mental health condition was Eric Holder Jr. diagnosed with?
Schizophrenia
Did Judge H. Clay Jacke II consider Holder's mental health in the sentencing?
Yes
